resources.string: Pro správnou funkci aplikace potřebuje přístup k poloze zařízení
Akce trvale smaže profil ze seznamu sledovaných zařízení.
Google Play Service app je nedostupná.
Tato aplikace vyžaduje Google Play Service verze 11.0.0.
For correct functionality of the Device Tracker it is mandatory to enable location permission. You can do so by going to:\nSettings>Apps>TrackR>Permissions>Enable Location permission.
For correct functionality of the Device Tracker it is mandatory to enable global location settings. Navigate to System Settings>Location: and enable location.
For correct functionality of the Device Tracker it is mandatory to update your Google Play Service version to version 9.6.1 or higher.

If you require any technical support or you want to provide feedback please email:
pacmac.dev@gmail.com

For feature request please use same email address.

Information sent between devices based on unique IDs are NOT collected and provided to any 3rd party companies.\nFrom time to time Android Device Tracker may collect network quality data(for instance signal strength) which is further anonymized to prevent any reference to specific user phone. Such network quality data might be forwarded to 3rd parties which are involved in mobile network improvements across the globe.

Information sent between phones:
Phone Location
Time of location update
Battery State
Mobile Signal Strength

Android Device Tracker is application for sharing phone locations between two or more Android devices. Transmitting of phone location is setup using private unique ID available in Settings screen. Transmitting of location updates can be enabled/disabled for this device in Settings including possibility to prevent any further changes by setting a password protection.\nFor receiving of another device location updates the unique ID used in tracked device has to be added into list in main screen.\nThis application works only on Android phones or tablets.

Phone which is intended to provide its location to other phones can be setup in application Settings, where mandatory information is unique ID and tracking mode switch in on position. Optionally if tracking mode is on then this phone can be easily added to main list of tracked devices, additionally frequency of location updates sent by phone can be set in the same menu. Please note that internet connection is required. If no location is sent within few minutes please refer to section "Something Is Wrong" which will automatically appear in this list if application sees any obstacle which can affect functionality of this application.

Adding devices is now simpler than ever and it can be done from the application main screen by tapping on button with plus symbol. You have to set alias for tracked phone and unique ID which is defined in phone which is transmitting its location. Optionally you can set image for better distinction between multiple tracked devices.
App update needed on this phone!
GPS v tomto zařízení je VYPNUTO
Aplikace vyžaduje aktualizaci Google Play Service app.
Budeme poctěni pokud můžete obětovat pár vteřin hodnocením této aplikace na Google Play Store. Také budeme velmi rádi za jakékoliv připomínky a náměty na nové funkce.
- Pro správnou funkci se ujistěte, že máte aplikaci aktualizovanou na nejnovejší verzi.
Ahoj vyzkoušej tuhle novou alikaci Android TrackeR!
Toto zařízení nemá přístup ke GPS poloze. Zkontrolujte své GPS nastavení ve vašem telefonu, zřejmě je GPS zcela vypnuto.
Jestliže chcete sdílet GPS polohu z tohoto zařízení, stiskněte ANO. V opačném případě bude toto zařízení schopno jen přijímat polohu jiných přidaných zařízení.
Pro podporu kontaktujte pacmac.dev@gmail.com\\nDěkujeme za používání naší aplikace, p@cmac.
